name: Quake: A Growing Disaster
description:
HTML version works, but it sounds BAD.  Please DL it if you have the time.

I made this for the GoGodotJam.  My intent was to just keep iterating on the classic game snake until I ran out of time.  Here is the result.

Obligitory "this is in now way related to the Quake series of fps games or endorsed by the publishers.  The name is in no way trying to capitalize on a more popular game, and is named similarly only because you literally play an earthquake"

Source code will be available on my Github in a few days.  Be warned, it was made in a hurry and the source reflects it:

https://github.com/nodeg0/nodeg-GameJam-Games
